body: Also, it's pretty obvious she's a futa from the thumbnail (it says W♂ENER for shit's sake) if you hate it and still clicked on it, that's your fault. I find most who are as vocal as the people here are usually in denial and trying to distance themselves from it because of some stigma they have.

Futa does not equal male. Anyone who thinks that is trying to convince themselves they don't actually like it. Their body is still 99% female. That's why I like Futa but am repulsed by men. 

There are A LOT of kinks/fetishes that I don't like but I don't go out of my way to bash them. Live and let live. If it isn't for you then there's an Internet worth of stuff you probably do like.

@mase10 Seriously, if I had a dollar for the amount of times I've see these whining fools and their ineptitude on reading the damn tags before bitching, I'd be rich enough to buy myself a Switch Bundle for Smash Ultimate.

@Display Book Because, bub, Futanari is liked by lots of people like myself. You can say whatever ya want, but Futanari's been long apart of the Japanese Hentai system since the 90's, probably long enough before some of us were even born. If you can't fathom the concept behind it, then that's your own problem.
all you futa haters should fuck off
